name: R-Type Final 2 - Stage Pass Volume 3
description:
Purchase R-Type Final 2 Stage Pass Volume 3 and get DLC Set 7, 8, and 9* as they become available to download. All Stage Pass Volume 3 content will be available by late October 2022. If you purchase R-Type Final 2 Stage Pass Volume 3, all future content that is part of this pass will be accessible in-game once it is available. R-Type Final 2 game required; sold separately.


*Note: DLC contents consist of the following:
  • DLC Set 7: includes 2 new stages
  • DLC Set 8: includes 2 new stages
  • DLC Set 9: includes 3 new stages
